function.name: search_with_rag
function.description: Useful when you want to search topics in the database with an LLM model using Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) approach. What is included in the database are only the following: travel to the UK, travel to Greece. The model will return the most relevant information based on the input question. Call 'search_with_rag' **ONLY** for the above mentioned topics.

search_phrase.description: The search phrase to be used to search the database. The search phrase should be related to the topics in the database. The searchphrase can be a comma-separated list of topics.
